pullrequest.title: Added support for removing sensors at runtime

content.raw:
Ok I updated the Sensors file and the sample world to make it easier to test, you can run the example world, remove the entities through the gui and confirm that they have been removed by listing the topics \(without the PR they are still there, with the PR they are removed\).

I _sometimes_ get a segmentation fault when removing objects in this way, but I don’t know if it is a known issue of removing entities or if it’s a regression I should look into. Also the cone removal doesn’t quite work making me think there is something sketchy there.

Now there is starting to be a lot of repeated calls to EachRemoved so I think it might make sense to move it  to RenderUtil, I’ll have a look at what it looks like.
